src_original: om sarvatathāgatamaṇiśatadīpte jvala jvala dharmmadhātugarbhe svāhā |
om svabhāvaśuddhe āhara āhara āgaccha āgaccha dharmma dhātugarbhe svāhā |
om namo bhagavate vairocanaprabharājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,  tadyathā,  kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambhotsyata idamavocad bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ |
ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
iti gāthayā pratiṣṭhāṃ kṛtvā om mano bhagavate ratnaketurājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,
om ratne ratne mahāratne ratnavijaye svāhā ityanena caityavandanāṃ kuryyāt |
